column4: Could someone tell me why, when I open a file browser, it quite often will open 4 or more of them?
For example, clicking on Places -> Home will open up about 4 different file browsers of my /home/ directory.
that's wack! I don't have a clue.. l'd be lookin in that browers setup stuff.. but that's wack.
Yeah, just started doing that one day... no clue why.
